Installation Guide¶

Requirements¶

The primary dependencies of tropycal are as follows:

  • matplotlib >= 3.0.0
  • numpy >= 1.15.4
  • scipy >= 1.1.0
  • pandas >= 0.23.4
  • xarray >= 0.11.2

Installation¶

Tropycal can be installed via cloning it from github. Running the following commands will build and install tropycal into your python installation:

git clone https://github.com/tropycal/tropycal
cd tropycal
python setup.py install
